issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Add SQL support for referencing fields in structs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10761](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10761). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I would like to be able to use SQL to query data sources such as Parquet and JSON that support nested types.

Example:
```java

SELECT id, first_name, address.zip AS zip_code FROM customer
```
